title: 3 and Out - Carson Wentz 'Dead Cap' Convo; Kicker Blair Walsh on Pressure Kicks, Memorable Makes and Devastating Misses
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Carson Wentz 'Dead Cap' Convo; Kicker Blair Walsh on Pressure Kicks, Memorable Makes and Devastating Misses
description:
In this episode, John discusses the massive "dead cap" hit the Eagles are taking by dealing Carson Wentz to the Colts, and why Philly is willing to take the hit. He also has an extended conversation with former Pro Bowl kicker Blair Walsh who shares an inside look at life as a kicker in the NFL pressure cooker, memorable makes, devastating misses, and trying to stay in the NFL. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
